website_summaries.verdict: This is an excellent solution for apartments and condos, and its privacy settings, ease of installation, and wide field of view are great features.
pros: Bell button, motion detector, and impact sensor sends alerts to your smart device
cons: Expect to recharge its battery once per month

customer_reviews.title: Great for Apartments
customer_reviews.text: We live in a third floor apartment with a door facing an exterior breezeway and this camera was just what we needed for security. Our front door is the only entry or exit for our apartment so we now have a 30 second video record of every entry and exit plus anyone approaching or even walking past our door. The $3 per month fee is well worth the price. Video quality is great during the day or night (see photos), and we can view from our phones or on our TV with our Fire TV stick. It also sounds a chime on our Echo Dot when anyone rings the door bell or knocks on our door.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: $200 Peephole
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work with a glass storm door in front of door. I have tried every imaginable combination of settings, nothing. I leave night-vision off at all times as suggested, still nothing. Works fine if storm door is open, but that is not what I need.
customer_reviews.author: speediest

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is perfect for my apartment. It was easy to assemble both hardware and software. The only thing i don't like is when the microphone and the speaker is on at the same time while you're trying to communicate you hear a loud chirp, you would have to mute one at a time in order to hear or to speak so that the other person can hear you on the other end or you will be able to hear them on your device
customer_reviews.author: dominique

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work if you have a storm/screen door
customer_reviews.text: Doorbell will not detect motion if you have a screen door or a storm door!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Motion detection not working
customer_reviews.text: Tried all settings / sensitivity, and still getting false alarm on motion detections all over the place. Yet when a real person walk in front/toward the door,, and right in front of the door, nothing!! Don't want to go through return process, so turning alerts off and will use it as high-tech peekhole.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work - check door thickness/depth
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for our door - apparently it’s meant for much thicker front doors, and it would not sit flush with the inside of ours due to the depth.
customer_reviews.author: Janell1

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't COMPATIBLE with my email address?
customer_reviews.text: My email address did work with the Ring product. Spent 1 1/2 hrs on with technical support who ended up suggesting that I use a different email address. No thanks. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: W P Curtis, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Worked For 24 Hrs Then Crap (Returning)
customer_reviews.text: This product worked fine for 24 hours, then turned to crap the second day. Videos are now black when they start, By the time they do start the person is already gone. I’m not going to waste my time trouble shooting these issues. They actually said move my router closer to the door, It’s 12 feet away for christ sake, and it’s NOT close enough? Get bent!! How about you make a product that works, so i don’t have to be a IT tech to get your product to work properly. Also, 2.4ghz is crap, you should have allowed for 5G use and it may have actually worked! I will be sending this product back to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: ThePeanutButterKid

customer_reviews.title: Great if you dont want any kind of video security
customer_reviews.text: This is a $200+ dollar gimmick. The motion detection, IF it kicks in, doesn't start recording until well after the event. I had UPS park right in front of my house, approach my front door, knock on the door, set the package down and leave. I got the motion alert after he was already driving away. It recorded an empty street. I figure it may help identify someone if they break into my home and kill me. By the time the door is kicked in and the murder is done it should start recording the person leaving... Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MasonM

customer_reviews.title: Opted for Ring vs 1 or 2 to get eye level footage.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install hardware and the app. The kit includes tools and adapters so that the Ring can be adjusted to fit a range of peephole widths. The Ring motion sensor in our townhouse was being triggered by passing cars but the support team helped to resolve that issue. With a few more tweaks to the Ring (i.e. the ability to pan down. Panning up works well.) and a second camera to detect deliveries to the garage door we will be all set. Even without the the tweaks, the Ring has been helpful. We have conformed comings and goings and dealt with a few issues.
customer_reviews.author: MMDZ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute life safer! We have a neighbor that has been harassing us by standing in front of our door yelling things at us and throwing trash in front of our door. Cops wouldn't do nothing. Now we can catch then red-handed!! The camera has wonderful clarity and coverage. The motion detector is very sensitive and the audio is very clear. I highly recommend everyone to get a ring device of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Renee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: The camera and audio on this device are amazing. I have an extremely wide view of outside my apartment unit. This makes me feel very safe when I’m home, as well as away from home. Installation took 5 minutes. Make sure you fully charge before you install, I didn’t because I was antsy!
customer_reviews.author: DNA

customer_reviews.title: Great for renters!
customer_reviews.text: Great for renters, as you do not have to make any modifications to property, deal with wiring, etc. There are at times delays in video when motion has been detected. Sometimes it captures UPS delivery and sometimes not. I’m not sure if that is product issue or WiFi issue. Even so, the peace of mind that comes with this product is worth it to me. At any time, I can look at live video that captures a broader area than limited scope through standard peephole. Took 5 mins to install. Super easy and happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Know What You are Doing
customer_reviews.text: This door bell only works if you have a peep hole for your door which I did not know at the time I order it. If you do not have a peep hole for your door it will not work for you order the Ring Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Collum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for the door
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase so far. I just installed it 2 weeks ago and caught this random act of kindness of these guys returning my husbands wallet. If I didn't have this, I would have never answered my door.
customer_reviews.author: J Monique

customer_reviews.title: This Puppy is Worth every dime...Even that dang battery is really easy to replace/Install
customer_reviews.text: Now this thing is one very clever little booger. It even looks good. Easy to use, audio is adequate though not great. I can easily recommend this device to others. The only thing to make it better would be to have it automatically trigger a video device when someone is detected the front goor. Nothing else compares with Ring Service and Support, and this company is constantly improving and innovating it’s products.
customer_reviews.author: Realwyattburp

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Buy an alternative brand.
customer_reviews.text: It took about three hours to connect. As soon as I “shared” the device to my husband’s phone, it disconnected both of us. Now the device will not connect to either app. He deleted his app. I’ve deleted and re-downloaded. We’ve reset. It’s absolutely terrible. The “off brand” security cameras that I purchased for 1/4 of the cost, set up easily and stream throughout the house with no issues. I did not set the cameras up, until after the Ring device stopped working. Yes, I’ve read everything, watched the videos, taken the steps beyond the alerts.. $199.00.. and this Ring door cam will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great idea that needs work
customer_reviews.text: Living in an apartment for the first time I didn’t feel safe. Plus someone had pounded on at my door at 5 am frightened me. Another time I thought a locked the front door and I found the top bracket locked but the door was open? Very strange. I had high hopes for this camera. The idea 💡 is smart but there are things that need to be refined. 1) The video image needs improving. It lacks clarity. 2) There is a delay when you answer. 3) the peephole camera does not move, I hope this a feature they can add. Overall for now it will serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: It’s an adequate option for apts/condos ... not the best security option
customer_reviews.text: The cam is okay ... since it’s for an apt I don’t need night vision or some of the other features of the cam. I do need consistent motion detection and as of late the motion detection switch toggles to off in the app - this wasn’t an issue until a few weeks ago and customer service hasn’t come up with an answer for the occurrence. Biggest disappointment is if you do not buy into the cloud storage it’s really useless - it doesn’t even save answered rings in the cloud for a few hours of playback or allow a local capture option (much in-less a different cloud storage option).
customer_reviews.author: eulalia brooks

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Home Security
customer_reviews.text: Wow... just wow! This is exactly what I have been waiting for. I have been patiently waiting on this product to release and am so happy with the results. Its crystal clear (and we have a glass screen door), has a wide view point and easy to see through peep hole. I am beyond happy with the Ring Door View and strongly recommend it to anyone! I guess I know what the family is getting for Christmas this year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J. Lawn

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: If you think you will see who is at your doorstep live go get a Nest or something else, this will not do that, you will see half of the action after it was recorded after a long loading period, the concept of seeing someone live at your door is out the window with this, there is such a delay or latency that it just won’t happen, sometimes it detects movement and you only see pieces of the video, Not the whole timeframe it was supposed to record, like it cuts in the middle and resumes after.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Subscription is mandatory for decent functionality
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with google assistant. Subscription is mandatory to view motion alerts. There is a ton of generic doorbells for a fraction of the price but more practical. Be ware free trial will last until the return period is elapsed then you realize you're stuck with a two way camera that cannot record locally or be of any use if something does happen and you need footage.
customer_reviews.author: amine carlito

customer_reviews.title: All it needs is a 'Wife'
customer_reviews.text: The Ring Door View Cam is easy to install, just unscrew the peep hole and insert the Ring from the outside thru the hole and attach the other half on the inside. The coverage is good although a bit high for most people. My only problem is that the wife wants to fly a flag from the porch column and when the wind is blowing the flag sets off the motion detector. The unit needs a more tailored motion zone detection feature or what I call, the wife. (Wife interference factor eliminator).
customer_reviews.author: Captain Fred

customer_reviews.title: Would not install, and Ring product support could not provide a solution.  Twice.
customer_reviews.text: The first shipment we got, the product would not power up. After 11/2 hour on the phone with Ring product support, they recommended shipping it back and exchanging it. Got the second one. It powered up ok, but it would not connect to the internet. Ring product support could not figure out a solution after another lengthy telephone call, and the internet is full of people with the same complaint. Had to to ship back the second one for a refund. At least Amazon is good on returns!
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Man

customer_reviews.title: First experience with Ring - now we're hooked
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the Ring Doorbell never interested me. But once I saw the Peephole, I wanted to give it a try. It's like the Doorbell, but with the added feature of being a live peephole. You get the actual doorbell and camera, and can look out anytime. The battery life and wifi have been excellent. I love that I can use the talk/listen feature from anywhere with my phone (on the app). The peace of mind this technology provides, for such a reasonable price, is outstanding. We liked it so much we got the motion camera too. Stop being a cheapskate and start protecting your family. Get this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Theis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great so far
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing and great battery life. Going on 3 or 4 weeks with a little over 50% charge left. Sucks that you need membership to get history. But it's only $3 a month I believe. Still on my free trial so not sure how it will be without it. It also works great with echo and allow you to talk to people outside or chimes if someone is knocking/ringing. It sometimes does not detect when people walk up to my door or knock, tho. Or it will think someone is knocking when I open and shut the door. Which can be pretty loud if people are sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Nawaf

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay connected to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: Update 8/1/19 Ring contacted me and sent a replacement unit and chime pro for me to re try. I haven’t installed it yet hopefully this time everything works properly I will update soon. I liked the concept but unfortunately returned it. Would not stay connected to my WiFi. Tech support wanted me to reboot my router every time, blamed my router. Everything else in my house stays connected so I ruled out my router.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Munyon

customer_reviews.title: It keeps you aware of what is going on outside
customer_reviews.text: It is a learning curve for me. I just installed this a couple days ago. So far, only experiencing difficulty speaking to someone at the door. I love seeing who is out there as I am often in my back office office. You can't see the ground but since you can see the delivery person approaching and leaving, it is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: ONLY FOR PEEPHOLES PPL
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the description very thoroughly! I bought this thinking it was smaller than the normal regular ring and no smh it’s ONLY MADE FOR PEEPHOLES! I was so mad because i don’t even have a peep hole lol smh it just be on my behalf but maybe if the description wasn’t so vague and the pictures didn’t show it on the side of the door this review would be totally different.. But at the same time i can’t lie i could have just been me buying the wrong thing but hey i got it and now I’m reviewing it so nobody else makes this mistake
customer_reviews.author: Kai Renee

customer_reviews.title: Delayed response
customer_reviews.text: Installed this 2 days ago, installation was easy, great instructions, however connecting to WI Fi problematic. I eventually had to call Ring tech support, they had difficulties connecting it to Wi Fi too, even though I had very strong Wi Fi signal. Reset the device 4 times, finally worked. Still having issues , response is very slow, and delayed. In order to get Live View to work, I have to go outside press the door bell, then a live view appears. I will re set this one more time before asking for a replacement. Ring tech support is awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying the ring family and services. The peephole works great. Battery lasted about 3 weeks with regular activity. Adjusted the motion sensor to fit my needs. Highly recommend if you are in an apartment. Took about 5 mins to install after watching the video. Took the peephole out without a scratch using the tools that were included in the package. I will take this with me when I buy my home. The peephole on it works just as good as the one with the door. The ring peephole also has a privacy cover which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great device, crap battery
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this device, BUT for the battery. Charged it according to the manual instructions when it arrived, lasted for a little over a month, which I find acceptable given the amount of motion outside my door on a daily basic. The problem lies in recharging it. I've had the original battery charging for over a day now and even when the charge light turns green to indicate charging is complete, when I put it back in the cam, it's just as dead (16%) as it was when I pulled it out two days ago. I just had to order a replacement to get my cam working again. Fingers crossed I didn't get another dud.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C.

customer_reviews.title: Okay with issues
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and the GUI is pretty straight forward. However, I wish it record at all times for you to view the footage. The issue is, when it detects motion, it may or may not pick up the footage of the person you are trying to identify and it only records for one minute and then cuts off. This is terrible, it should show you five seconds before motion was detected and should record as long as their is motion when you have it set to detect a human. Otherwise it is well built and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: EDC

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the door view cam if you have a glass storm door!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and installed it and as long as I stood right in front of it with no storm door it detected motion, but close the door and nothing. I chatted with support and their answer: Regarding with the glass door in front of your door view cam, yes it won't detect any motion if there's a glass door in front of the camera. I'm returning it! It would be nice if Ring would say that in the description of their product. I've known $20 cameras that would detect motion behind glass.
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this to anyone! It's the BEST thing my fiancé and I have bought! The motion detection can detect from a great distance and immediately alerts your phone with great video quality. We can speak to whomever is at our door at any time. I can watch over my packages from wherever I am and not have to stress about rushing home to get it 🙌 😌 Installation was moderate to easy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Criswell

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what I was looking for and I was super excited when it was released. Got it super fast, but it would not work with our door (our door was the right thickness and the hole was fine..) because of the decorative wainscoting on the outside the device wouldnt sit flush between the pieces. Since it didn't sit flush, the piece to screw the back plate into was too short and unsuable. If it were a little longer and there was a shroud that could go around it, it could have worked, but ultimately I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R.

customer_reviews.title: SCAM NOT NEW ITEM REFURBISHED
customer_reviews.text: Ring listed this as new, but it's definitely not. This is a REFURBISHED ITEM. It arrived with several seals broken, is missing the install tool, the charger and cable and the instructions, and the unique QR code is a sticker over the original QR code. Complete SCAM. FALSE AND MISLEADING AD
customer_reviews.author: Jay Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea great product
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1.Good Idea since its uses the peephole place 2.No need for any wiring 3.Battery last for almost a month. 4.Can be connected with alexa. Cons 1-Not so good in detecting people 2-Video recording is not always good , its like buffering a movie from internet , with low bandwidth ... so it skip parts of recording and hang on others , record audio without while picture is stand still ! but still i like it :)
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim A.

customer_reviews.title: Motion Alert Frustration
customer_reviews.text: I have reached out to support multiple times. I am so frustrated with the Ring app at this point. I have Motion Notifications set to ON in the app. Almost every time I go back into the app it has toggled the motion notifications back to off. I turn it back on every time I’m in the app but it never fails to be back OFF the next time I look. I have no snooze on, no motion schedule. I cannot imagine why the app keeps turning this off on its own and have received no help or answers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Very clear!
customer_reviews.text: Shows who is at your door or near. Can be a bit costly plus if you want to keep video's you also have to pay $3 a month. Very clear but when there are people it is not always as clear. I still think it works great! If you want to delete the video's on your phone you have to do them one at a time but you can go on the computer to do it and you can delete them all at once. You can also download them onto your computer hard drive to keep as long as you want.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: **update 9/12/2020** still works as expected and I’m happy with it!! **Update 8/27/2020** it’s been a few days and we love it. You do have to play around with the settings a few days to see what works best for you. For example- Since our road is not busy I have the detection zone set the highest, but that may not work for others and they will have theirs lower since they have busy streets. So far it’s met our expectations, but I’ll do an updated review in a few days/weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable! Amazon and FEDEX drivers are disabling the recording and live view functions!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to do a complete reinstall after an Amazon delivery driver disabled the Ring Peephole cam. This keeps happening with Amazon and FEDEX drivers: I can hear the chirp from their hand held scanners as they approach. I go to my Ring app and no surprise Live view is not working. I go to the recording on my Ring app and the webiste and no surprise it did not record the Amazon or FEDEX driver. I went to the Ring Support and they are lieing to customers that it is their settings. No its not my settings. Ring will record my neighbors walking by, cats and dogs, but will not record or live view Amazon or FEDEX drivers???
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after someone broke into our garage. I wanted the peephole camera because I didn't have the know how or ability to attach it to the outside doorbell. It is fabulous! Easy set up and it's been on since the day it arrived. The battery needed to charge and uses a micro USB charger like most Android phones. It's at 95% after a week so I have no doubt the battery will last. I have a free month of upgraded service through ring which is excellent. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed with Peephole Ring abilities
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews ahead of time so I knew what I was buying- I knew that the Ring Peephole didn't work too well or at all thru the glass on my storm door. It does not work at all thru the storm door and only alerts me once the storm door is open. Besides that it works well- sometimes it takes long to load the live feed when you get an alert which can be annoying. Installation was super easy and so far I am impressed with the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for apartments
customer_reviews.text: It works great, does what it says for the most part, but it’s not great for apartments. There needs to be a way for the motion sensor to detect motion approaching the camera, not just walking by. I’ve set the sensitivity to the lowest possible threshold, set up blindspots, and my door is even set back in away from the hallway, and it still picks up every person who walks by.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works well, don;t like to pay for video storage
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to install in peephole, I replaced a Brino with this. Works well. My big complaint is Ring wants me to pay for video storage - which I refuse to do. There should be a certain small amount of free storage as there is with the Blink system, which I also have. Since Ring and Blink are both Amazon companies, there should be a small amount of free storage for both!!! Hence the 4-stars. Haven't used tech support, hence no rating for that. Night vision seems to work well, though my porch has 2 lights on at night, so not a good test of night vision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Installation and setup was pretty easy, especially after I figured out you have to plug the outside part into the inside part. Picture is clear. We have a porch light, but the view out onto the darkened street is excellent. My only complaint is figuring out how to get alerts to wake up my phone and display. Still working on that. Did manage to link the Ring with my Amazon account (today), so maybe I'll figure out more features. I got this on sale for a good price, and overall I'm happy with it. Just wish it didn't require a tech engineer to get it set up and working the way I want.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Audio doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Works good the only downside is that the audio doesn't work. People can heard you when you speak to them but if is someone at your door you CAN'T hear them tru your phone,I thought that it might be the device so I sent it back and got another one and still can't heard anyone trying to speak to me from outside my door. So the audio is not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, imo...
customer_reviews.text: Blink is leaps and bounds better than ring. I have both blink and ring around my house. I only have ring for my peephole doorbell because my hoa wont allow me to install my blink cameras in the front of the house due to mounting onto brick. Blink has much better video quality and the ability to limit the trigger area much more accurately, better sound quality and they dont charge you for cloud storage like ring does. I wish I had more hands, so that I could give ring 4 thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good for its purpose (Check out my YouTube review under "Landpet")
customer_reviews.text: Check out my YouTube review with sample clips (search for "landpet") Pros: -Good quality video, not amazing but gets the job done. -Audio quality could be better but it's ok enough to have a two-way conversation. -Easy to install -Battery seems to last a while, goes down 2% every 24 hours for me with my motion settings (I have optimized them). Cons -Can't see packages, can only see someone brought a package and left without it if you sign up for the Ring Protect Plan assuming Motion picked it up which it does for me.
customer_reviews.author: landpet

customer_reviews.title: Good for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the camera does what I want. I initially bought the camera to know when the maintenance guy comes to fix things in my apartment and see when packages are delivered. The camera meets these goals. I will add that it doesn’t seem to pick up quick motion easily. Meaning that it can be difficult to see the individual’s face as they walk by quickly.
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnects from Wifi
customer_reviews.text: I like this product when it actually works. I have to reset my internet modem /router weekly so it will reconnect again( yes it disconnects weekly). they are in the same room, so it's not the signal. etc. It won't simply reconnect like you'd think it should, it won't reconnect unless I restart my modem /router. It's aggravating and I'm sure at some point I'll just uninstall it and throw it away because at times it's nothing but a bulky, over,sized peephole.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Newman

customer_reviews.title: That it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the new Ring system that mounts in the center of the door. I removed the perk hole and installed the Ring. The instructions are good except the battery strap. It takes some extra thinking and trying different ways to get the strap in place. Setup is very easy and the interface to my phone is great. Ring has always had a fish eye lens system this might be a future enhancement
customer_reviews.author: Dayton Holt

customer_reviews.title: Almost a good design
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease with which this installed on my front door. Connected to the wifi easily and gave me a false sense that RING knows how to design stuff. HOWEVER, the doorbell does not ring inside. The person at your door gets an ear piercing ring, but there is no ring inside the house (or it is so soft I can't hear it). I suspect that RING/Amazon wants you to purchase an accessory Chime which is notoriously difficult to get to work. The app on a Samsung phone leaves a lot to be desired. Deleting videos has to be one at a time and get the menu for deleting each one is a hit or miss thing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great for an apartment.
customer_reviews.text: I chose the Ring peephole camera after looking at many different options. I live in an apartment and it seems to be the best option for that. Downloading the app and installing the camera was easy and fuss free. You can adjust the motion sensor settings as you like, along with many others. It captures knocks and rings with no problems. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shara Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have a hard wired bell, with small windows on each side of the door there wasn’t an ideal way to mount the other battery powered models.. not to mention they are a little bulky.. Needed to drill a hole, 1/2 in but did the job , make sure you start with smaller bits and work up to the 1/2 “, and make sure you drill level.. Looks awesome, seamless integration with ring chime and apps....very happy with the product, bought a second battery, not sure I buy it can last 6 months... Excuse the picture, in the dark and wife had Xmas wreaths swinging on the door, painting scheduled for warmer weather..!
customer_reviews.author: Philip zangara

customer_reviews.title: Won’t fit peepholes with Auth style door chime assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This will NOT fit every peephole. Our apartment has a peephole/ mechanical door chime assembly and the hole for the viewer is cut MUCH larger than the Door View Camera will accommodate. Even the included adapter rattled around in the hole and pushed straight through.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it works
customer_reviews.text: I live in a condo so it used to catch people walking by my unit. After about a week, it no longer did that. Also it only catches us coming home or leaving about half the time. Can't blame the wifi because it's only about 20 feet away with no walls blocking the signal.
customer_reviews.author: B.Shimizu

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so torn. I love having this - it’s great to know when packages are dropped off, or to see who’s at the door without having to walk over. My bigger issue is motion detection. I adjusted and extended the motion detection range because it was only picking up the backs of people coming to my door. After extending, cars driving by would activate motion detection, but still encountering issues with the Ring not starting to record until after someone is walking away. Not ideal at all, especially if you’re trying to catch porch pirates.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: The camera is really easy to install and to setup. You don’t need any tool, everything is included in the box. The only downside is the time needed to charge the battery before the installation, and I am slightly concerned by any potential marks left by the rubber on the door paint when moving out. The motion detection is perfect, you can easily adjust it so it doesn’t go off every time the neighbors from across the hall get out. It is perfect to know when your packages have been delivered, when maintenance is coming in, especially when linked to the Ring alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Instructions leave much to be desired.  Great product though
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot. Have a ring alarm which I think is great. The ring app tried to connect to the same network as was used to set up the alarm. After 5 fails, I called tech support. Not great. I finally tried to connect to my guest network and it installed the first try. If you have ring products already set up, the app will not ask for a password and it won’t connect to your network. Fault in the app. Once I tried the guest network, instant success after it asked fora password. The tech dude just asked if this was ok with me. Yes it was, but the app needs to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Olena

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase this year!
customer_reviews.text: This peephole Ring device was so easy to set up and start using! The video is very clear and easy to view. I have issues with my vision so using my Ring device is a safety issue as well. Now I can see who is at my door and choose if I’ll answer or not. I love that there is a little door that I can open to view the person outside or I can leave it closed. At first, my apartment manager said that the old peephole couldn’t be removed but it could and it was. This by far the best purchase that I have made for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S.

customer_reviews.title: Too much delay time from recording start time
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have this camera, as it caught someone trying to break in through my front door. However, the camera lags with motion detection, and didn't catch the guy walking up to my door, just him trying the handle and attempting to barge his way through. Quality is pretty good. The "neighbor" app is kind of waste for me, as that has more to do with the idiots who post stupid, judgemental comments and non-important safety/lost pet alerts. Overall a great little piece of added security for us renters.
customer_reviews.author: Cherlindrea

customer_reviews.title: Its great when it works!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment, install was easy and flawless. Ever since the trail period ended and I didn’t subscribe to Rings recording system subscription, the whole ring experience has left me questioning my purchase and seeking an alternative. The trail period was great, everything worked flawlessly. However now there are times my Ring camera wont turn on or even respond. I highly recommend buying any other alternative door camera because this one will leave you disappointed the longer you own it.
customer_reviews.author: emer s.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, great detail!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I was able to buy this on sale for $100 off which was awesome, and Amazon offered a payment plan which made it easier to purchase. Thanks Amazon! Set up was very easy, and I’m not a very handy person nor am I very technical. The tool they provide to remove your peephole is very convenient and much appreciated! The App for Ring is very easy to use and doesn’t take much time to get used to. I’m really glad I purchased this and will definitely start looking into adding more Ring cameras around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Double A

customer_reviews.title: Renter Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: We are renting so we couldn't get the original Ring, and we were glad to have this option. This one is okay, but we frequently have issues with the connection and it sometimes is super delayed when picking up on movement, even when we have the motion settings on the most sensitive mode. Sometimes it's great, and sometimes it's terrible. Depends on the day. I would buy it again though because it’s better than nothing, and it’s a good option for home security if you don’t want an expensive system.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: I took away one star due to the slight lag between receiving the motion notification and opening the video; however, overall, the camera is clear and does its job. Due to the position on the door, you won't be able to see your packages on the ground, but you will see it being dropped off and if anyone else approaches it. Great find for condo owners like myself!
customer_reviews.author: bofinr08

customer_reviews.title: This is daaaaa bomb
customer_reviews.text: The ring doorbell is awesome. I get notified whenever anyone is at my door. I can also play the video on my amazon show, which is awesome. It’s pretty loud when you talk over it so it makes it easy to startle my kids and husband.... which is a lot of fun. I was really excited that you could customize your doorbell to different sounds (yes there are Halloween options)
customer_reviews.author: codirae glass

customer_reviews.title: Works well but the cloud video is slow to view
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install in a peephole. Make sure there is room below the peephole for the device to fit flush against the door. We had a door knocker in the way. We have tweaked the sensitivity so it triggers reliably for people walking up to the door. It also picks up large trucks in the street but not too often to be an issue. The main complaint with it is reviewing the video after receiving a notification. It can take frustratingly too long to show the video. Sometimes I have had to close the app and open again to show the video. Other than that, we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisotpher J. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Too Sensitive, Cannot see videos at all without a paid plan
customer_reviews.text: The camera is too sensitive. I want it to only show people who come to the front door, but it is set off by people walking by on the sidewalk even though I set it to the lowest sensitivity and smallest coverage area. Also, the item description says you must subscribe to a plan to SAVE your videos, but after the first month, I cannot even see the video once. It should at least save them for 24 hours. This basically means you need a plan to use this device at all. That is misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Without subscription this device is not so useful.
customer_reviews.text: I am using it with echo video, but the connection is very slow and buggy, which makes it not so useful. Someone ring the bell, but it takes 30 seconds see them on video... useless. Other than that, recoding requires subscription, which makes it more useless without subscription. I used it over month and even have purchased an extra battery, but started considering about switching to other solutions. If you are willing to pay $30/device/year for subscription, this might be OK to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jabberwky

customer_reviews.title: Keeps disconnecting from Wifi!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for one week and I will probably return it. It's constantly disconnecting from wifi and missing things. Our router is in the room right above the front door. We have the highest speed available through Verizon so wifi shouldn't be an issue. I read other reviews that had this same issue but I purchased this anyway, hoping it would be different. I was planning to add more Ring cameras (Spotlight cam) but I think I will go with another brand that is more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: hh378

customer_reviews.title: Ring Peephole Camera Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Work as it should, easy set up, fi perfectly in peephole, clear video, love that I can see, talk to anyone at my door before I get to the door or when I’m not at home. Had for a week so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Wingie

customer_reviews.title: Snap installation....
customer_reviews.text: Snap to install. Still having problem getting full integration with Echo Show. When motion detected (?), it will announce that fact on the show but cannot get it to display live picture and there is no voice communication between the ring and the Show device. The (?) mark is because I am coming to the conclusion that the sensor is not ‘motion’ but ‘thermal’. If anyone know for sure which, please post on Amazon Reviews for the Ring. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: RonC32

customer_reviews.title: Peephole and camera!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Has motion and knock detection. Some peeps like to knock instead of pushing door bells (like law enforcement). Tied Ring to my Echos, so when I'm out in the backyard swimming, my Echos notify me of motion / doorbell. My front door faces the majority of my yard so this fits perfectly. My doorbell area would have only given me a side view. Super easy installation. I bought a spare battery so it will never be out of action for a charge!
customer_reviews.author: AngryScotsman

customer_reviews.title: Not the functionality that I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a video door bell, where when someone rang the doorbell, I could pick up my phone and see and talk to them. Well, I can do that with the Ring, but it takes so long for the doorbell to power up and get online that it is almost useless. However, I did get a ring while I was away from the house, and that was a great experience. If it was a little faster, that would be great. I don't use the motion detection or online storage. If I wanted those features, I would rate it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: D. Elson

customer_reviews.title: if you are renting, don't forget to keep your original peep hole.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the device for a week. It is fun to peek through my camera to the front door through the day.It took some time to get the battery to charge, but it seems it will last for some time. It was easy to replace the peep hole lens with the camera and set up the device to Alexa and other apps. This is a remarkable product. I haven't needed tech support yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Finally Arrived!
customer_reviews.text: We have been waiting for something like this to arrive on the market! We rent at an apartment and wanted a ring for some time, but could not install it properly. This perfectly covers our needs. My only complaint is that you have to pay/sign up for a subscription to simply VIEW the captures on your device. I can understand saving it and monitoring, but I am paying a nice amount for the device so I should have access to VIEW those. Please consider adjusting that in the future.. The year membership is VERY affordable, just think we should have access to that.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Ring doorbell
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, it picks up everything that walks in front of the door. It sends your notification or alert when somebody is in front of your door to your phone. It also is the doorbell, it also works with the echo Dot. Works really good!!!!! I love it!!!! And with Alexa Let's you no when someone rings your door Bell. This ring can do alot!!! And then ring has there own page, were you can look to see if there's crime going on in your neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Burton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Condos and Apartments
customer_reviews.text: I live in a condo building. After having issues with randos trying the door, I got this really as a deterrent. It was super easy to install -- just watch the video on youtube. I turned off the alerts for motion detection since my door faces a hallway. However, I have been able to review the motion detection videos and they are great. Door bell works flawlessly. Got the door bell to sound on my Alexa's as well. I have no complaints and am very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Just my two cents...

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and has a good picture. Major drawback is the short life of the battery. I have to recharge every few weeks and that is a nuisance. Having to pay for the events captured might make a competitors video doorbell a better deal. I got it on a sale price so overall it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This peephole doorbell/camera is awesome for my apartment. I can see who is at the door right from my phone, talk and hear the person through the built in feature (even when I’m not home and not connected to WiFi!!) I love it! There is also a Ring Neighborhood feature that allows people in the same neighborhood to post videos and messages in the event that there is someone stealing packages or the like.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Darling

customer_reviews.title: It is an okay device
customer_reviews.text: The camera isn't great for capturing down low close to the door, the microphone audio isn't good, and the first device I received was defective. It works, but I expect for them to release a much-improved version in the future, this one has many faults. It would be nice if it came with 5g wifi to help deal with the usual crowded 2.4g channels in apartment buildings. It might be worth the wait for a revised model that will hopefully correct these deficiencies.
customer_reviews.author: Seeseebeach

customer_reviews.title: Does work well as does not need external power
customer_reviews.text: Hooking up to internet took awhile, but did connect. REALLY needs a way to delete all unneeded events at once. Also, when I am home our two bio-alarms (Schipperke watch dogs) beat the notification of motion at door by at least 30 seconds. Conversation through it is slow, with a lot of lag time. Still, beats not having anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment for Added Home Security
customer_reviews.text: Love our camera! We had a different one before, paid more for it too. Should have just gotten the Ring! Excellent motion detection. Great video quality. Paired easily with our phones. Some great features, including neighborhood reports from other Ring users. Looks super sleek and fit perfectly into our peephole. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kang

customer_reviews.title: Poor motion detector
customer_reviews.text: First one I bought, the battery wouldn't charge. They exchanged the entire product without any issues. However, I am not happy with the motion detection. This product does not catch half or more of the movement at my apartment door. Seriously considering sending it back as I am still within the window.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Bunny

customer_reviews.title: fantastic bargain
customer_reviews.text: I procrastinated for the longest time until I saw this sweet deal, the echo dot and the Ring combo is an unbeatable bargain! works perfectly in unison! I love how the Echo will notify me verbally if the Ring camera picks up any movement. For your sanity and peace of mind, it's a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: B.A. Quill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my apartment because one of our packages got stolen from our front door. It picks up our neighbors going in and out of their front door even when it's at it's lowest motion sensing range - I would say that's the only downside. Otherwise, it's been super accurate and provides a clear picture. It's easy to install and is very easily compatible on your phone and the other amazon products. I'm so glad they made a Ring option for people that live in apartments!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Fisher 77

customer_reviews.title: Battery causes slight delay
customer_reviews.text: Fun and peace of mind. Received this a week ago and was so easy to install. The hardest part was removing the old paint over the existing peep hole but the included tool made it super easy to dig out and remove the paint. The battery takes about 6 hours to fully charge. Only complaint so far is the delay in recording; someone will be halfway through the frame before it recognizes movement. However, it's entertaining to listen in on our trashy neighbors. But without having to mess with electrical, makes it a plus for renting without damaging/modifying property.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Larrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an Apartment!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and I bought this Ring camera because it's battery-powered and can be installed through the door's existing peephole. It's perfect! I was worried that maybe the battery might not last very long and that I would have to be re-charging it constantly but the battery has lasted just over a month before needing a new charge. This product is even better paired with amazon alexa devices like the echo dot. I love when someone presses the doorbell and my echo says "Someone is at your door".
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Faybik

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, caught an attempted thief and was able to scare them off
customer_reviews.author: Empress

customer_reviews.title: Works well but shouldn’t cost to store recordings
customer_reviews.text: The Ring Peephole Camera does install quickly. I had to widen the outside of the hole a bit. These apartments have metal doors so a bit of a pain. Setup is quick. Cons: I would like better zones for motion activation to keep from recording my neighbors entering and leaving. Also the recordings should be stored on the phone. Instead they charge you $3 a month for cloud storage. Come on Ring! Very greedy.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I believe I got it for around 80 and for that price it is an absolute steal. Amazing features and qualities. Great picture. Ability to go back and see motion notifications later. Truly a great product DEPENDING on what you need it for. I got this more for times when I know someone is coming (aka pizza) and I can see when they get here rather than them knocking for 10 mins and leaving because I was dumb and got sidetracked in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Apartment dwellers dream, clever adaptation of original design
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated o getting one of these for my apartment but the piece of mind has been priceless. No more worrying about weirdos listening at your door in the night or wondering who left a mess in the hall or knocked on your door. Get a second battery so you can swap quickly and keep filming when it's low, charging time takes about 8 hours and has a nice quick release from the interior with a micro usb charge port. Performance is decent, installation was very well documented and easy. Would prefer Ring make a reversion with much smaller exterior footprint. I don't find the doorbell button needed at all due to the knock detection.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, price is right, brings a lot of piece of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this option as I am a renter and this did not make any permanent changes to the apartment. This makes me feel a lot safer knowing I can see when someone comes to my door. Highly recommend, install took less than 5 minutes and it’s very attractive. I also LOVE the knock detection. If someone knocks it notifies me that someone may be knocking on my door. For the price this is a great value and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, always is expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Despite it is slow, it was the wrong item that was sent to me ! Because I had chosen the newest one which it comes with spur battery, this one is not cheap if you compare it with the advanced one how? Her is the answer: this one will cost you around $87 but you will need + $29 extra battery plus charging battery base of around $19 👏 Now calculate how much you need to spend after all is amount of $140+tax!!!!!So I rather by the advanced one instead, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Goode B B

customer_reviews.title: Falls short of expectation. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product. The app is not very good. It has completely missed logging and recording when I personally open the door. When someone rings the door bell it takes about 10-15 seconds to show up. By the time you answer they might be gone. The live view is not very reliable. It lags a lot and videos are very choppy and freeze. Very disappointing and I will be returning and looking for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Like the “knock” feature
customer_reviews.text: Works like all the other Rings except the “knock” is definitely a plus. Folks are not used to ringing a doorbell on the actual door, so I get the knocks instead. Rings away happily. The sensor seems to have missed at least one delivery person even tho the person knocked. Would still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Noelia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, once you know what to do.
customer_reviews.text: They only give you video playback for a month and then you have to subscribe and pay to continue keeping the recordings. My issue is by the time my phone alerts me the people are gone if it's a delivery and when people ring the doorbell I can't hear it because the chime is on the outside. They do that on purpose so you have to buy the indoor chime extender for another $30.
customer_reviews.author: R. D

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand the poor reviews...?
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended. Peephole DoorbellCamera. I was skeptical about seeing the low reviews on Amazon but... I guess I shouldn't listen and just see for myself. Happy to have it. Not excited about the pay for video storage but I can also understand video storage is not free nor cheap. If there was a more advanced option for those brave enough to set up home storage that would be awesome (I'm a software developer I could set up a home one) Our package stealing problem days are over.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

product_meta.title: Ring Peephole Cam - Smart video doorbell, HD video, 2-way talk, easy installation
feature_bullets: Upgrade your door’s peephole with a 1080p HD video doorbell that enables you to see, hear, and speak to visitors from anywhere.
Get alerts on your phone, tablet, and PC when anyone knocks on your door, presses the doorbell button, or triggers the motion sensors.
Peephole Cam is easy to install and comes with all the tools you need to replace your peephole in under 5 minutes; no wiring or drilling required.

Connect your Ring doorbell with Alexa to hear announcements on your compatible Echo device when your doorbell is pressed and see a live view of your camera if you have an Echo device with a screen. Talk to visitors by saying “Alexa, talk to the front door.”
Advanced Motion Detection lets you easily adjust the built-in motion sensors to focus on and detect what’s important to you.
Always know when you have a delivery and tell the courier to place your packages in an ideal location.
With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review what you missed for up to 60 days, and share videos and photos.
